name: rebel zero
description:
Join the star wars rebels in this 3D take on arcade games. You play as a rebel trying out a new experimental spaceship called the bombardier. Fight tie fighters as you launch yourself into battlefield where the not only the enemy are your opponents but you must doge asteroids as well.

This is my first game ( I am only twelve) and I hope you enjoy it!

models: ship https://3dwarehouse.sketchup.com/model.html?id=978...

tie fighters: http://www.blendswap.com/blends/view/8053

imperial destroyers: https://3dwarehouse.sketchup.com/model.html?id=8e9...
